shortDescription: On Linksys WAG54G2 1.00.10 devices, there is authenticated command injection via shell metacharacters in the setup.cgi c4_ping_ipaddr variable.
vulnerabilityName: linksys wag54g2_firmware Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
